info.description: This is a REST API server for managing events and attendees.
info.title: Go Gin REST API

get.description: Get all events for a specific attendee

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token

get.description: Get the active basket for the authenticated user

delete.description: Remove all items from the active basket

post.description: Add a product to the user's active basket

delete.description: Remove an item from the basket by Item ID

get.description: Get a list of all event categories

post.description: Create a new event category (requires authentication)

get.description: Get a category by its slug
Get a paginated list of all events with filtering, sorting, and search

parameters.description: Search term for name, description, location
parameters.name: search

put.description: Update an existing event (requires authentication and ownership)

delete.description: Delete an existing event (requires authentication and ownership)

get.description: Get all attendees for a specific event

post.description: Add an attendee to an event (requires authentication and event ownership)

delete.description: Remove an attendee from an event (requires authentication and event ownership)

get.description: Get all comments for a specific event

post.description: Add a comment to an event (requires authentication)
post.summary: Add a comment to an event

delete.description: Delete a comment by ID (requires authentication)

get.description: Get a list of all products with advanced pagination, filtering, sorting, and search

parameters.description: Search term for name, slug, description
parameters.name: search

get.description: Get a product by ID or Slug

put.description: Update a product by ID (Owner only)

delete.description: Delete a product by ID (Owner only)

get.description: Get the authenticated user's profile information

put.description: Update the authenticated user's profile information

post.description: Create a new profile for the authenticated user

get.description: Get a paginated list of all registered users

values.description: For IN, NOT IN, BETWEEN operators

x-enum-comments.OpBetween: Between: field BETWEEN value1 AND value2
x-enum-comments.OpIsNotNull: Is Not Null: field IS NOT NULL

x-enum-descriptions: Is Not Null: field IS NOT NULL
Between: field BETWEEN value1 AND value2

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
